full_text:
REMEDIES.

	In addition to all remedies and penalties provided by law, any person who violates the provisions of this Article shall be subject to the provisions of Subsections B. and C. of Section 151.10 of this Code.

1.name:

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

REMEDIES. (§ 49.93)

  REMEDIES.	In addition to all remedies and penalties provided by law, any
person who violates the provisions of this Article shall be subject to the
provisions of Subsections B. and C. of Section 151.10 of this Code.

REMEDIES.

In addition to all remedies and penalties provided by law, any person who violates the provisions of this Article shall be subject to the provisions of Subsections B. and C. of Section 151.10 of this Code.
